<script>
function openSlides(url) {
  document.getElementById('slidesFrame').src = url;
  document.getElementById('slidesModal').classList.add('active');
  document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
}

function closeSlides() {
  document.getElementById('slidesModal').classList.remove('active');
  document.getElementById('slidesFrame').src = '';
  document.body.style.overflow = '';
}

// Close on escape key
document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
  if (e.key === 'Escape') closeSlides();
});

// Close on click outside
document.getElementById('slidesModal').addEventListener('click', function(e) {
  if (e.target === this) closeSlides();
});
</script>
